query.value:
select
 id
,Name
,Ownerid
,owner.name
,Owner.Sub_Region__c
,CloseDate
,StageName
,Deal_Type__c
,MainProduct__c
,OpportunityHEALTH__c
,RLF_percent__c
,Regional_Sales_Manager_Comments__c
,Accountid
,Account.Name
,Opportunity_18chr_Id__c
,Amount
,Order_Number__c
,Sales_Region_FY07__c
,Pricing_Country__c
,Misys_Forecast__c
,Term_Estimate_Months__c
,Commercial_Prop__c
,ILF_Amount__c
,Total_ILF_In_Qtr__c
,Accretive_RLF__c
,RLF_Amount__c
,PS_Amount__c
,ASP_Amount__c
,TCV_CSH__c
,ACV_ACV_Equiv_CSH__c
,Strength_of_Sale__c
,Global_Account_Manager_Comments__c
,Executive_Sponsor_alignment__c
,Next_Step_Due_Date__c
,NextStep
,Approval_Status__c
,sbaa__ApprovalStatus__c
,Term_CSH__c
,Deal_Category__c
,Service_Type__c
,Service_Sub_Type__c
,Campaignid
,Opportunity_Partner__c
,Original_Opportunity__c
,RecordTypeid
,RecordType.Name
,LastModifiedDate
,CreatedDate
,Existing_RLF_Currency__c
,CurrencyIsoCode
,SBU_Strategic_Business_Unit__c
,FiscalPeriod__c
,Total_PS_Amount__c 

from Opportunity

where CreatedDate >@{activity('Get Last Created Record').output.firstRow.Created}Z OR  LastModifiedDate >@{activity('Get Last Modified Record').output.firstRow.Modified}Z

source.sqlReaderQuery:
select max(cast (Lastmodifieddate AS datetime)) AS Modified
  FROM [STG].[Sales_SFDC_Booking]

select max(cast (createddate AS datetime))  AS Created
  FROM [STG].[Sales_SFDC_Booking]
